title: packets.go broken pipe
body:
by **yxw.2013.03**: 
[root@s3 tmp]# tail -n 300 screenshot-stderr---supervisor-seMmqM.log
[MySQL] 2014/11/11 09:50:31 packets.go:30: EOF
[MySQL] 2014/11/11 09:50:31 packets.go:92: write tcp 192.168.1.3:3311: broken pipe
[MySQL] 2014/11/12 11:01:31 packets.go:30: EOF
[MySQL] 2014/11/12 11:01:31 packets.go:92: write tcp 192.168.1.3:3311: broken pipe
[MySQL] 2014/11/13 09:10:23 packets.go:30: EOF
[MySQL] 2014/11/13 09:10:23 packets.go:92: write tcp 192.168.1.3:3311: broken pipe


I am using  github.com/go-sql-driver/mysql， 

maybe some bug with the package，

I don't know how to fix it！
